case.title: USA Looking For Euro Wife (Beach California)
case.text: Looking for fit, attractive European lady. I'm a marine biologist educated in the arts and sciences, I culture pearls in the south pacific and enjoy exploring new places and cultures. I love designing and creating high end jewelry,the beach,rain forest, fishing, a great day at the spa fun restaurants,cooking and good music, actually most of life's pleasures makes me happy. I've never been married and have no children. So if you think you would like traveling the south pacific and having a great life let me know. So here's a few pics of me and what I do.
